div.p: Relationship between basal metabolic rate (BMR abs, ml O 2/min) and date (October 1st = 1) with their corresponding non-linear tendency lines in great tit ( a) and blue tit ( b) populations from Oulu (blue circles and dashed line) and Lund (red squares and solid line), and willow tits ( c) from Oulu (black circles and solid line)
